resources.string: Well, well, well… You want to read something, ah\?\nLet\'s play a game first.\nTap the TOP of the screen
Now tap the BOTTOM of the screen
Again, tap the BOTTOM of the screen
Again, tap the TOP of the screen
NOW, you need to guess. TOP or BOTTOM? Tap now!
Can you read? Next time tap the area I told you to! Tap me to start over.
Nope, I wanted the other one. Let\'s try that again. Tap me to start this all over again.
You are so lucky. We\'ll play this again later. Enjoy your book.\n\n Tap me to read your book.
